author: cvuosalo
body:
The geometry validation scripts in this PR appear not to have been used for several years. They either could not run or they encountered serious errors or exceptions while running. These scripts are intended to be occasionally used by experts to perform validations. They are not used in production.

The goal of this PR is to enable these scripts to run to completion without encountering major exceptions. The idea is that something is better than nothing. However, this PR does not ensure that these scripts are performing complete and fully correct validation. A follow-up PR by an expert with more time and expertise will be required to update and correct all these validations for current scenarios.

#### PR validation:

The scripts actually run to completion without major problems. Some potentially useful geometry validation is performed.

No backport is needed.
title: Enable rarely used geometry scripts to run to completion
